description:
The job title is Frontend Engineer Intern, and the description is as follows: 

This project is for a Frontend Engineer Intern to work in an interdisciplinary team to design and optimize webpages for maximum efficiency, maintain brand consistency, and ensure alignment of web design and user experience requirements. This 3-month evaluative unpaid internship will provide the opportunity to gain experience and potential for return offers. Skills used includes ReactJS, JavaScript, CSS, Frontend Development, NextJS.. The skills required for the job are ReactJS, JavaScript, CSS, Frontend Development, NextJS.
